CustomField.description: KIS - Invoicing - Use this Date field to specify the Invoicing Run Date - in place of system date - This allows KeepItSafe to run billing for the month in advance of the 1st of the month.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: KIS - Invoicing - Use this Date field to specify the Invoicing Run Date - in place of system date - This allows KeepItSafe to run billing for the month in advance of the 1st of the month. (MM/DD/YYYY)
CustomField.label: Billing Run Date *Verify Date Format
